item.title: Cloud Logs
item.description: Audit Login activity For admin account go to IAM -> Credential report to see all the users and the following information:

item.title: Cloud Users And Policies
item.description: IAM Stands for Identity Access Management. There are several types of IAM identities. They are usually called “Principal”.

item.title: AWS Configuration
item.description: Default Configurations By default, SSH 22 and RDP 3389 are closed, but these are suggested to be opened when creaing them, warning how dangeroud this is.
